message.content:
cs.CR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.SE 

This paper deals with a security issue in spam filters, which falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR). The proposed defense method involves the use of mixture models, which is a common technique in machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also discusses the limitations of the naive Bayes model and proposes a more robust approach, which relates to data structures (cs.DS) and software engineering (cs.SE).
